title: Decorating: Technique and Style
description: Decorating your home is one of the most exciting and fulfilling tasks you can take on. Technique and Style guides you through the pleasures and pitfalls of choosing form the plethora of colors, materials, and styles available. The first section covers all aspects of planning and executing the perfect effect, from painting to doors and windows to soft furnishings, and more. The second section takes seven inspirational design styles and demonstrates how to recreate them in your home. Includes over 400 color photos and 75 illustrated step-by-step instructions.
author: Barty Phillips
